name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire Quiz / Test | Mixed | 15 Questions

questions.text: What word can be put in front of the words 'track', 'way' and 'horse' to make three other words?
Which of these cartoon characters is a rodent?
What were the first two initials of the character played by Larry Hagman in 'Dallas'?
In the Old Testament, who, with God's help, parted the Red Sea?
Which month of the year was named after Julius Caesar?
In which Broadway musical did actress Glenn Close star in 1995?
Which of these celebrities was not a member of the 'Rat Pack'?
In what city does the singer meet 'Mr. Bojangles'?
How many X's are there on a regular clock face with Roman numerals?
What name was given to the style of architectural design popular in the 1890s?
Which Amendment granted women the right to vote in the USA?
Who was the first Australian Prime Minister?
Which of these is a different gender from the others?
Which types of flowers are described as 'ericaceous'?
